blogPost.excerpt:
It’s not where you go.  It’s what you leave behind . . . Chef, writer, adventurer, provocateur: Anthony Bourdain lived his life unabashedly. Roadrunner: A Film About Anthony Bourdain is an intimate, behind-the-scenes look at how an anonymous chef became a world-renowned cultural icon. From Academy Award®-winning filmmaker Morgan Neville (20 Feet From Stardom, Won’t You Be My Neighbor?), this unflinching look at Bourdain reverberates with his presence, in his own voice and in the way he indelibly impacted the world around him. 

Subscribe to Focus Features: http://bit.ly/FocusFeaturesYouTube

Become a Focus Insider: https://insider.focusfeatures.com 

Website: https://www.focusfeatures.com
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/focusfeatures
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/focusfeatures
Twitter: https://twitter.com/focusfeatures
blogPost.body:
It’s not where you go.  It’s what you leave behind . . . Chef, writer, adventurer, provocateur: Anthony Bourdain lived his life unabashedly. Roadrunner: A Film About Anthony Bourdain is an intimate, behind-the-scenes look at how an anonymous chef became a world-renowned cultural icon. From Academy Award®-winning filmmaker Morgan Neville (20 Feet From Stardom, Won’t You Be My Neighbor?), this unflinching look at Bourdain reverberates with his presence, in his own voice and in the way he indelibly impacted the world around him.

どこに行くかではありません。 何を残すかである。シェフ、作家、冒険家、挑発者。アンソニー・ボーデインは、臆することなく自分の人生を生きた。Roadrunner: A Film About Anthony Bourdain」は、一人の無名のシェフがいかにして世界的に有名な文化的アイコンとなったのか、その舞台裏に迫った作品です。アカデミー賞受賞監督のモーガン・ネヴィル（『20 Feet From Stardom』『Won't You Be My Neighbor?

localize.title: ROADRUNNER: A Film About Anthony Bourdain - 官方预告片 [HD] - 7月16日上映
localize.description:
这不是你去哪里。 而是你留下了什么......。厨师、作家、冒险家、挑衅者。安东尼-布尔丹毫不掩饰地过着他的生活。奔跑者。关于安东尼-布尔丹的电影是对一个无名的厨师如何成为世界知名的文化偶像的一个亲密的幕后观察。这部由奥斯卡奖获奖电影人摩根-内维尔（《星光大道20英尺》、《你愿意做我的邻居吗》）拍摄的影片，对布尔丹的观察毫不含糊，他的存在、他自己的声音以及他对周围世界不可磨灭的影响都让人回味。

订阅Focus Features: http://bit.ly/FocusFeaturesYouTube

成为《焦点访谈》的内部成员：https://insider.focusfeatures.com 

网站：https://www.focusfeatures.com
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/focusfeatures
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/focusfeatures
Twitter: https://twitter.com/focusfeatures

localize.title: ROADRUNNER: A Film About Anthony Bourdain - 官方預告片 [HD] - 7月16日上映
localize.description:
這不是你去哪裏。 而是你留下了什麼......。廚師、作家、冒險家、挑釁者。安東尼-布爾丹毫不掩飾地過着他的生活。奔跑者。關於安東尼-布爾丹的電影是對一個無名的廚師如何成爲世界知名的文化偶像的一個親密的幕後觀察。這部由奧斯卡獎獲獎電影人摩根-內維爾（《星光大道20英尺》、《你願意做我的鄰居嗎》）拍攝的影片，對布爾丹的觀察毫不含糊，他的存在、他自己的聲音以及他對周圍世界不可磨滅的影響都讓人回味。

訂閱Focus Features: http://bit.ly/FocusFeaturesYouTube

成爲《焦點訪談》的內部成員：https://insider.focusfeatures.com 

網站：https://www.focusfeatures.com
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/focusfeatures
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/focusfeatures
Twitter: https://twitter.com/focusfeatures

localize.title: カマル・ウスマン、スパイシーウイングスを相手にマットに向かう｜ホットワンズ
localize.description:

localize.description:
